metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21913 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
International Components for Unicode (ICU-20850) v66.1 was discovered tocontain a use after free bug in the pkg_createWithAssemblyCode function inthe file tools/pkgdata/pkgdata.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu60 - 60.2-3ubuntu3.2
libiculx60 - 60.2-3ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.2-3ubuntu3.2').
